description: Proposed conversion of garage into habitable space and associated alteration to dwelling house.
decision_conditions: The proposed change of use of the garage to ancillary residential accommodation would not constitute development under Section 55(2) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). The alterations to the front elevation of the garage would comply with Part 1 Schedule 2 Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 5, Part (n) (Traffic and Construction Management Details) -The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 5 (Part (n) only) of planning permission 20/00505/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please provide existing and proposed roof plans at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, north point, showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work.
